name: Sly Cooper Murderworld mystery
description:
Ever since Sly Cooper was lost in Egypt in Sly Cooper Thieves in Time, and Sly Cooper 5 in the works, I planned to continue his legacy, by adding in the same characters, and making newer ones. This story is the Case of Murderworld where an evil hyena clown named Arkade plans to use a deadly bomb which will make it's toxic gas spread to Paris and make everyone laugh till death. As Carmelita Fox gives instructions to her strike team of what Arkade is planning, they will travel by boat to sneak their way into Arkade's Abandoned Amusement Park, outside of Paris sea, And it is up to Sly Cooper, and his team to get to Murderworld and stop Arkade's bomb before it detonates.

Hope Sly Cooper 5 is accepted to be made, and Sucker Punch will give them new abilities like Ratchet and Clank Rift Apart.
